content: As an AI language model, I don't have an opinion, but I can tell you that materials science is an ever-evolving field, and researchers are constantly exploring new ways to develop and release new materials for commercial use more quickly and efficiently. One key area of focus is the development of advanced computational tools that can help predict the properties of new materials based on their chemical structures and other factors, allowing researchers to focus their efforts on the most promising candidates. Additionally, advances in automation and robotics could also help speed up the manufacturing process for new materials, making it easier and faster to scale up production. Overall, there is a lot of ongoing research, development and improvements towards making breakthroughs accelerating the materials science field in the future.
